document.full_text: a federal judge on monday ordered jared lee loughner, the college dropout charged in january's arizona shooting rampage, to undergo a mental evaluation in missouri to see if he is competent to stand trial.
document.title: judge orders loughner mental evaluation in missouri
lines_and_colors: a federal judge on monday ordered jared lee loughner, the college dropout charged in january's arizona shooting rampage, to undergo a mental evaluation in missouri to see if he is competent to stand trial.
